arabic_text: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ
translation: (53) And [recall] when We gave Moses the Scripture and criterion[27] that perhaps you would be guided.
footnotes: [27]- Differentiating between truth and falsehood. "The Scripture and criterion" refers to the Torah.
